oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Littlefield & Steere letterhead
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Littlefield & Steere Company letterhead (upper portion only). Etching of the building, corner of Clinch and Second Streets, Knoxville, TN. Also shows Clinch Avenue Viaduct and train. Manufacturing Confectioners. Red Seal Brand, Trade Mark. H.E. Littlefield, President. A.H. Steere, Vice-Pres. W.J. Bacon, Secty & Treas. No date.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Letterheads; Ephemera; Business enterprises; Bridges;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
